hero.badge: 次世代プレイリスト管理ツール
hero.title: プレイリスト管理を<2></2><1>革新する</1>
hero.description: Playlist Wizard で YouTube のプレイリストを直感的に管理。強力な機能であなたの音楽体験を次のレベルへ。

comparison.title: Traditional Methods vs <1>Playlist Wizard</1>
comparison.description: See how Playlist Wizard improves music management.

playlist_management.title: Playlist Management
playlist_management.traditional: Manual playlist management with limited features.
playlist_management.playlistWizard: Copy, merge, delete, and filter playlists with one click.

structured_playlists.title: Structured Playlists
structured_playlists.playlistWizard: Manage playlists with structured playlists to automatically organize your music.

search.title: Search
search.playlistWizard: Search and filter playlists by title and artist.
